categories: Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: A failed Jedi was active during the Galactic Civil War. The Jedi had an alcohol problem, and considered liquor to be a necessity of life.
The failed Jedi appeared in Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game in an example of how a player character could—or, in this case, could not—use the survival skill.
